language.title: Language
language.description: The language that the bot will use for user responses

items.title: Persist configuration
items.description: Settings of what this config does

__key.title: Level
__key.description: The member level and below to apply this to

human.title: Human roles
human.description: Roles to assign to human users

bot.title: Bot roles
bot.description: Roles to assign to bot users

message.title: Message ID to detect reactions on

emoji.title: Emoji to trigger reactions on
emoji.description: When using default emoji, paste in their json escapes, when using custom emojis only place in their IDs.

caughtMessages.title: Random Trigger Messages
caughtMessages.description: Random message shown on top of the warning message

actualCaughtMessage.title: Static Trigger Message
actualCaughtMessage.description: Static message shown at the bottom of the warning message

banOnLeave.title: Automatically ban users that leave the server with pending punishments

pingsForAutoMute.title: Number of triggers for auto mute

staff.title: Bot Level needed to select user punishments (staff level)

emojiActions.title: Emoji Actions Punishments
emojiActions.description: The emojis that the bot will add for issuing punishments

level.description: Bot Level needed to bypass AntiPing triggers

targets.title: Targets
targets.description: Who to trigger illegal mentions on. Atleast one user/role AND one channel/category must be defined for this to work at all.

antiRaid.description: Anti raid configuration for message spam

items.title: Filter
items.description: NOTE: If you would like to disable a filter below, just set it to 0/0

__key.title: Bot Level
__key.description: The users of bot level and below that this filter will apply to

stop.title: Stop Processing Rules
stop.description: Whether to stop processing rules after this one, regardless if a violation is found

clean.title: Clean Messages
clean.description: Whether to clean users messages when they violate this filter

cleanDuration.title: Message Clean Time
cleanDuration.description: If >0, how long ago to clear messages of users when they violate this filter. If this is 0, this time will be automatically calculated

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to take when this filter is hit

actionDuration.title: Action Duration
actionDuration.description: How long the action should last (in 1h30m format)

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Amount of characters to trigger a violation on

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: Amount of messages to trigger a violation on

newlines.title: Newlines
newlines.description: Amount of newlines to trigger a violation on

emoji.title: Emoji
emoji.description: Amount of emoji to trigger a violation on

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Amount of attachments to trigger a violation on

links.title: Links
links.description: Amount of links to trigger a violation on

duplicateMessages.title: Duplicate Messages
duplicateMessages.description: Amount of duplicate messages to trigger a violation on

antiRaidPingRole.title: Anti Raid Role to Mention
antiRaidPingRole.description: If using AntiRaid, the role ID of the role to mention when a raid is triggered

antiRaidPingChannel.title: Anti Raid Channel to Mention on
antiRaidPingChannel.description: If using AntiRaid, the channel ID of the channel to send a mention when a raid is triggered

channels.title: Channel Configurations
channels.description: Individual antispam configurations for a specific channels

items.title: Filter
items.description: NOTE: If you would like to disable a filter below, just set it to 0/0

__key.title: Channel
__key.description: The ID of the channel to apply this filter on, regardless of who sends the message

stop.title: Stop Processing Rules
stop.description: Whether to stop processing rules after this one, regardless if a violation is found

clean.title: Clean Messages
clean.description: Whether to clean users messages when they violate this filter

cleanDuration.title: Message Clean Time
cleanDuration.description: If >0, how long ago to clear messages of users when they violate this filter. If this is 0, this time will be automatically calculated

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to take when this filter is hit

actionDuration.title: Action Duration
actionDuration.description: How long the action should last (in 1h30m format) when using TEMPMUTE or TEMPBAN

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Amount of characters to trigger a violation on

messages.description: Amount of messages to trigger a violation on

newlines.title: Newlines
newlines.description: Amount of newlines to trigger a violation on

emoji.description: Amount of emoji to trigger a violation on

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Amount of attachments to trigger a violation on

links.title: Links
links.description: Amount of links to trigger a violation on

duplicateMessages.title: Duplicate Messages
duplicateMessages.description: Amount of duplicate messages to trigger a violation on

categories.title: Category Configurations
categories.description: Individual antispam configurations for all sub-channels of a category

items.description: NOTE: If you would like to disable a filter below, just set it to 0/0

__key.title: Category
__key.description: The ID of the category to apply this filter on sub-channels, regardless of who sends the message

stop.description: Whether to stop processing rules after this one, regardless if a violation is found

clean.title: Clean Messages

actionDuration.description: How long the action should last (in 1h30m format) when using TEMPMUTE or TEMPBAN

levels.title: Global Configurations
levels.description: Individual antispam configurations for all members of a level and below

items.title: Filter
items.description: NOTE: If you would like to disable a filter below, just set it to 0/0

__key.title: Level
__key.description: The level and below of users that this filter applies to. All filters will be checked for a user as long as they match the level requirement, from lowest to highest until a violation is found.

stop.title: Stop Processing Rules
stop.description: Whether to stop processing rules after this one, regardless if a violation is found

clean.title: Clean Messages
clean.description: Whether to clean users messages when they violate this filter

cleanDuration.title: Message Clean Time
cleanDuration.description: If >0, how long ago to clear messages of users when they violate this filter. If this is 0, this time will be automatically calculated

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to take when this filter is hit

actionDuration.title: Action Duration
actionDuration.description: How long the action should last (in 1h30m format) when using TEMPMUTE or TEMPBAN

characters.title: Characters
characters.description: Amount of characters to trigger a violation on

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: Amount of messages to trigger a violation on

newlines.title: Newlines
newlines.description: Amount of newlines to trigger a violation on

emoji.title: Emoji
emoji.description: Amount of emoji to trigger a violation on

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Amount of attachments to trigger a violation on

links.title: Links
links.description: Amount of links to trigger a violation on

duplicateMessages.title: Duplicate Messages
duplicateMessages.description: Amount of duplicate messages to trigger a violation on

nameChecks.title: Username/Nickname censoring
nameChecks.description: Violations will censor the user's nickname

__key.title: Level
__key.description: The level and below of users that this filter applies to. All filters will be checked for a user as long as they match the level requirement, from lowest to highest until a violation is found.

stop.title: Stop Processing Rules
stop.description: Whether to stop processing rules after this one, regardless if a violation is found

violations.title: Violation Config
violations.description: Define what to do when members violate this filter. NOTE: To disable, either set action to empty, or trigger to 0/0

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to take when this violation is hit

actionDuration.title: Action Duration
actionDuration.description: How long the action should last (in 1h30m format) when using TEMPMUTE or TEMPBAN

globalViolations.title: Global Violation Config
globalViolations.description: Define what to do when members collectively violate this filter (i.e. a raid). NOTE: To disable, either set action to empty, or trigger to 0/0

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to take when this violation is hit

actionDuration.title: Action Duration
actionDuration.description: How long the action should last (in 1h30m format) when using SLOWMODE, LOCK_CHANNEL or LOCK_GUILD

actionValue.title: Action Value
actionValue.description: When using slowmode, how often members can send messages, in seconds

self.description: Whether to always allow invites for this server

vanityUrl.description: Whether to always allow invites for servers with vanity urls

whitelist.description: Whitelist configurations. NOTE: If you set any whitelist property, all invites sent that do not match it will be censored.

allowSubdomains.description: Whether to automatically allow subdomains of domains you whitelist.

whitelist.description: Whitelist configurations. NOTE: If you set any whitelist property, all urls sent that do not match it will be censored.

caps.title: Capitals
caps.description: Note: to disable, set Minimum Length to 0

minLength.title: Minimum Length
minLength.description: Minimum length that the text should be before checking the 2 next filters

followed.title: Caps in a row
followed.description: How many capital characters in a row to trigger on

percentage.title: Percentage of capitals
percentage.description: Percentage of capital characters in the text, 0-100

chars.title: Characters
chars.description: Note: to disable, set values to 0

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum characters allowed in the text

nonAscii.title: Block Non-Ascii
nonAscii.description: Whether to censor if the text contains any non-ascii characters

channels.title: Channel message censoring
channels.description: Violations will censor the user's message

__key.description: The channel ID of the channel which this filter will apply to.

nonAscii.title: Block Non-Ascii
nonAscii.description: Whether to censor if the text contains any non-ascii characters

hideNoAccess.title: Hide No Access Commands
hideNoAccess.description: When a member can't execute a command, whether to hide the 'you don't have permission' message

duplicateRegistry.title: Register existing slash commands as chat commands

level.title: New Level
level.description: The new level for this selector

bypassLevel.title: Bypass Level
bypassLevel.description: Level needed to bypass this entire override

channelsBlacklist.title: Channel Blacklist
channelsBlacklist.description: Channels where this override won't be able to be executed

channelsWhitelist.title: Channel Whitelist
channelsWhitelist.description: If any defined, the only channels that will be able to execute this override

rolesBlacklist.title: Role Blacklist
rolesBlacklist.description: Roles that won't be able to execute this override

rolesWhitelist.title: Role Whitelist
rolesWhitelist.description: If any defined, the only roles that will be able to execute this override

useWebhook.title: Whether to replace users' messages with a webhook message

checkLogs.title: Check Audit Logs
checkLogs.description: Whether to use audit logs information to log infractions not made using the bot's commands

integrate.title: Integrate System
integrate.description: Whether to use the ban reason/nickname integration system (see docs)

muteRole.title: Mute Role
muteRole.description: ID of your server's mute role

defaultDeleteDays.title: Default Ban Message Deletion Days
defaultDeleteDays.description: When banning members with command such as ban and tempban, how many days to delete messages of banned members

targeting.title: Targeting Settings
targeting.description: How members are able to interact with each other using commands

reqDiscordPermissions.title: Require Discord Permissions
reqDiscordPermissions.description: Whether the actor will always need the respective discord permission in order to perform an action with the bot

checkLevels.title: Check Bot Levels
checkLevels.description: Whether bot levels are checked for allowing targeting

checkRoles.title: Check Role Hierarchy
checkRoles.description: Whether the server's role hierarchy is checked for allowing targeting (members can't target people with higher roles)

allowSelf.title: Self Targeting
allowSelf.description: Allow users to target themselves at all times

othersEditLevel.title: Bot Level to Edit Other's Infractions

confirmation.title: Command Confirmation Settings
confirmation.description: How the bot will respond to your commands

reaction.title: Reaction
reaction.description: Whether the bot will add a reaction to your message depending on the outcome of the command

message.title: Message
message.description: Whether the bot will reply to you with full verbose on the outcome of a command

expiry.title: Expiry
expiry.description: If >0, how many seconds before the bot deletes the reaction and/or message.

deleteOriginal.title: Delete Original Message
deleteOriginal.description: Whether the bot will delete the original command caller's message when expiry is up

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.description: Whether to use audit logs information when logging discord events

embed.title: Use Embeds
embed.description: Whether to use embeds as log messages

description.title: Embed footer description
description.description: Text to show on embed footer

footerAvatar.title: Embed footer avatar
footerAvatar.description: URL of an image to use as embed footer icon

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: A Webhook URL for this channel. Highly recommended specially if using embeds.

ignores.title: Ignores Config
ignores.description: Set what should be ignored in logging

self.title: Ignore Self
self.description: Whether to ignore logs of changes to the bot user

selfAuditLogs.title: Ignore Self Actions
selfAuditLogs.description: Whether to ignore logs of changes performed by the bot user

extendUsersToAuditLogs.title: Extend Users to Audit Logs
extendUsersToAuditLogs.description: Whether to also ignore actions performed by ignored users

logChannels.title: Ignore Log Channels
logChannels.description: Whether to auto-ignore logs from channels marked as Log Channels

suffixReasonToAuditlog.title: Suffix Reasons
suffixReasonToAuditlog.description: Whether to suffix audit log reasons to log messages

reasonSuffix.title: Reason Suffix String
reasonSuffix.description: String to be suffixed to a log message if Suffix Reason to Audit Log is enabled

name.title: Subreddit Name
name.description: The name of the subreddit that you want to pull data from

channel.title: Channel ID
channel.description: The channel to post messages from this sub to

role.title: Role ID
role.description: A role to mention whenever a new message is posted, don't set if you don't want this functionality

__key.title: Channel ID
__key.description: The channel to post starred messages on (for this configuration)

emoji.title: Emoji
emoji.description: The emoji to trigger message starring on

maxEmoji.title: Max Emoji
maxEmoji.description: The emoji to visually display on the starboard channel when a message hits max stars

clearOnDelete.title: Clear On Delete
clearOnDelete.description: Clears the starboard starred message if the original is deleted by the author

clearOnModDelete.title: Clear On Mod Delete
clearOnModDelete.description: Clears the starboard starred message if the original is deleted by another person

minReacts.title: Minimum Reacts
minReacts.description: Minimum amount of reactions on a message for it to be published on the starboard channel

minReactsPin.title: Minimum Reacts to Pin
minReactsPin.description: Minimum amount of reactions on a message for it to be pinned on the starboard channel

maxReacts.title: Maximum Reactions
maxReacts.description: Maximum amount of reactions for color calculation and Max Emoji usage (doesn't actually stop new reactions after this is hit)

messageLifetime.title: Message Lifetime
messageLifetime.description: How old a message can be, in hours, for it to be able to be starred

preventSelf.title: Prevent Self Reacts
preventSelf.description: Prevents the message author from starring their own message

noStats.title: Don't award stats
noStats.description: Prevents messages in this board from affecting a user's global star stats

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Channel IDs in which to allow starred messages to originate from. If this is not set, any channel will be allowed.

ignores.title: Ignores
ignores.description: Channel IDs in which to deny starred messages to originate from.

levelEditOthers.title: Bot Level needed to edit other people's tags

level.title: Bot Level
level.description: Bot level needed to use translation reactions

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: The delay for which deleted messages can be sniped for (in seconds)

clearOnKick.title: Clear on Kick
clearOnKick.description: Whether to clear the member's custom role when they get kicked from the server

clearOnBan.title: Clear on Ban
clearOnBan.description: Whether to clear the member's custom role when they get banned from the server

clearOnLeave.title: Clear on Leave
clearOnLeave.description: Whether to clear the member's custom role when they leave the server
